Package Commands

Interface CommandVisitor

All Known Implementing Classes:
CommandExecutor
public interface CommandVisitor
The CommandVisitor interface defines a visitor for handling different types of commands in the MyFoodora system. Implementations of this interface should provide specific behavior for each type of command based on the role (Manager, Customer, Courier, Restaurant, or Anyone).

The visitor pattern is used here to separate the operations performed on the commands from the objects themselves, promoting better organization and scalability.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0, 2024-06-07
